label: Software Engineer Internship
description: The Software Engineer Internship offers hands-on experience for students interested in coding, debugging, and collaborating on real-world app development projects alongside professional engineers.

label: AI Research Contest
description: The AI Research Contest challenges participants to design and test AI models, present findings, and compete with peers while exploring innovative solutions to real-world problems.

label: Graphic Design Workshop
description: The Graphic Design Workshop is a guided learning session where students will use tools like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to create digital posters, branding materials, and design portfolios.

label: Marketing Internship
description: The Marketing Internship gives teens the chance to assist in campaign planning, social media management, and market analysis while working with professional marketers.

label: Medical Volunteering Program
description: The Medical Volunteering Program involves assisting with patient care, organizing health awareness activities, and supporting hospital staff in non-clinical tasks to understand the healthcare environment.

label: Data Science Bootcamp
description: The Data Science Bootcamp is an intensive program where teens will learn to clean datasets, build visualizations, and create simple predictive models using Python or Excel.

label: Art Exhibition Volunteering
description: As part of Art Exhibition Volunteering, students will help curate artworks, set up displays, assist guests, and learn about event coordination in the art world.

label: Business Strategy Contest
description: In the Business Strategy Contest, students will form teams to solve case studies, pitch ideas, and create mock business plans judged by industry professionals.

label: Nursing Internship
description: The Nursing Internship allows teens to shadow nurses, learn basic patient care techniques, and support administrative work in clinical settings, gaining insight into medical careers.

label: Automotive Technician Training
description: This training prepares teens for technical trades by teaching them how to inspect, maintain, and repair vehicle systems under the guidance of certified technicians.

label: STEM College Fair
description: The STEM College Fair connects teens with university representatives, hands-on STEM demos, and informational sessions about science and tech-related academic paths.

label: History Research Internship
description: In the History Research Internship, students will analyze historical documents, assist in archiving, and contribute to heritage projects under the mentorship of researchers.

label: Photography Contest
description: The Photography Contest invites teens to capture compelling images based on a theme, learn framing and editing skills, and submit their work for public exhibition.

label: Finance Workshop
description: The Finance Workshop teaches students about budgeting, investing, and financial planning through interactive simulations, group discussions, and real-world case studies.

label: Health Awareness Event
description: During the Health Awareness Event, students will engage in organizing wellness booths, creating educational materials, and leading peer activities focused on healthy living.
